extendedInfo.description: Ground Dragon from the bottom of the earth where holy fountain and life become lively to which it appears. Patron saint live wallpaper that defends person who lives.Two animations to enjoy!Change other animation by scrolling.Replay and pause by tap.*To use:Menu>Wallpapers>LiveWallpapers->Ground Dragon Free*Portrait only.*This wallpaper is trial version for one day.The animation does not play after one day.However, if you reinstall, you can use again.Full versionhttps://market.android.com/details?id=com.dmf.wall.GroundDragon*The scrolling depends behavior of Home application.If scrolling does not work or something strange, try to check Home app's settings.(scrolling speed, overshoot, etc.)*Please resetting if the screen turn black when updating it with setting the wallpaper.

reviews.title: I like these.
reviews.comment: Cos they are different from the others. Kinda like \'Ground Dragon Cave\' or waterfall.
reviews.author: A Google User
